speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: SCENE III. London. Before a tavern.

speaker: KING HENRY V
text_entry: Enter PISTOL, Hostess, NYM, BARDOLPH, and Boy

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: Prithee, honey-sweet husband, let me bring thee to Staines.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: No; for my manly heart doth yearn.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Bardolph, be blithe: Nym, rouse thy vaunting veins:

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Boy, bristle thy courage up; for Falstaff he is dead,

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: And we must yearn therefore.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Would I were with him, wheresome'er he is, either in

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: heaven or in hell!

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: Nay, sure, he's not in hell: he's in Arthur's

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: bosom, if ever man went to Arthur's bosom. A' made

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: a finer end and went away an it had been any

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: christom child; a' parted even just between twelve

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: and one, even at the turning o' the tide: for after

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: I saw him fumble with the sheets and play with

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: flowers and smile upon his fingers' ends, I knew

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: there was but one way; for his nose was as sharp as

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: a pen, and a' babbled of green fields. 'How now,

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: sir John!' quoth I 'what, man! be o' good

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: cheer.' So a' cried out 'God, God, God!' three or

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: four times. Now I, to comfort him, bid him a'

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: should not think of God; I hoped there was no need

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: to trouble himself with any such thoughts yet. So

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: a' bade me lay more clothes on his feet: I put my

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: hand into the bed and felt them, and they were as

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: cold as any stone; then I felt to his knees, and

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: they were as cold as any stone, and so upward and

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: upward, and all was as cold as any stone.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: They say he cried out of sack.

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: Ay, that a' did.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: And of women.

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: Nay, that a' did not.

speaker: Boy
text_entry: Yes, that a' did; and said they were devils

speaker: Boy
text_entry: incarnate.

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: A' could never abide carnation; 'twas a colour he

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: never liked.

speaker: Boy
text_entry: A' said once, the devil would have him about women.

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: A' did in some sort, indeed, handle women; but then

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: he was rheumatic, and talked of the whore of Babylon.

speaker: Boy
text_entry: Do you not remember, a' saw a flea stick upon

speaker: Boy
text_entry: Bardolph's nose, and a' said it was a black soul

speaker: Boy
text_entry: burning in hell-fire?

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Well, the fuel is gone that maintained that fire:

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: that's all the riches I got in his service.

speaker: NYM
text_entry: Shall we shog? the king will be gone from

speaker: NYM
text_entry: Southampton.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Come, let's away. My love, give me thy lips.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Look to my chattels and my movables:

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Let senses rule; the word is 'Pitch and Pay:'

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Trust none;

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: For oaths are straws, men's faiths are wafer-cakes,

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: And hold-fast is the only dog, my duck:

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Therefore, Caveto be thy counsellor.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Go, clear thy c rystals. Yoke-fellows in arms,

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Let us to France; like horse-leeches, my boys,

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: To suck, to suck, the very blood to suck!

speaker: Boy
text_entry: And that's but unwholesome food they say.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Touch her soft mouth, and march.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Farewell, hostess.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text_entry: Kissing her

speaker: NYM
text_entry: I cannot kiss, that is the humour of it; but, adieu.

speaker: PISTOL
text_entry: Let housewifery appear: keep close, I thee command.

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: Farewell; adieu.

speaker: Hostess
text_entry: Exeunt
